eas_text: A civil authority has issued A REQUIRED MONTHLY TEST for the following counties or areas: Adams; Asotin; Columbia; Ferry; Garfield; Lincoln; Pend Oreille; Spokane; Stevens; Whitman, WA; Bonner; Boundary; Latah; Lewis; Idaho; Kootenai; Nez Perce; Benewah; Shoshone; Clearwater, ID; Lincoln; Sanders, MT; at 11:00 AM ON JAN 7, 2026 Effective until 02:00 PM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is a test of the Emergency Alert System of the Inland Northwest area. In the event of an actual emergency, broadcasters would be bringing you important public safety information. The following tones conclude this test.
